title: THE BEST MOVIE
review: Love the faith displayed in this movie. A tear jerker from the beginning. Love it.

title: Amazing movie!
review: Diagnosed with cancer myself recently and it helped me come to terms with it. One of the best lines in the movie, until you die live!!

title: MOVIE ABOUT CANCER
review:
The feeling just like sailing boat without paddle in storm and hope from God.

Not talk about one, but two people with different problem. I can't said 'at least' but God save his brother with taking He as exchange.
